name: VIDIYEL TRUST
briefDescription: 1. Facilitating the rural poor and vulnerable to get their entitlements from central and state government. 2. Ensure the women and children to have better health and medical facility 3. Enhance the learning level of rural students by special classes 4.Guide the farmers to improve soil and water conservation and  Upgrade the environmeent by tree plantation 6. enable  landless labourers to take up alternate livelihood options through micro finance operational area Vialthikulam Taluk of Tamilnadu 5000 families benefited so far Major donorsNABARD, State and Central Govt. schemesForeign donors India Literacy Project and AIMS India foundation US for enhance the learning level of slow learners in rural area
